llm_res.rule: approve Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value. ... function approve(address _spender, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)

transferFrom Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism. ... function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)
